= How To Use ACPYPI = 

_It's still under development_

== Introduction ==

Download it:

`svn checkout http://acpypi.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ acpypi`

== To Test ==

At dir *acpypi*, type:

  * ` ./acpypi.py -i FFF.pdb`

It'll create a folder called *FFF.acpypi*, and inside it one may find topology files for GROMACS and CNS.

To get help, type:

  *  `./acpypi.py -h`
